title: Homeworld.Remastered.Collection.PROPER-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

Homeworld Remastered Collection PROPER (c) Gearbox Software

Release Date: 02/2015 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Simulation
The Homeworld Remastered Collection includes: Homeworld Remastered
Edition Homeworld 2 Remastered Edition As a bonus, you will also
receive free access to: Homeworld Classic Homeworld 2 Classic
Homeworld Remastered Steam Multiplayer Beta Experience the epic
space strategy games that redefined the RTS genre. Control your
fleet and build an armada across more than 30 single-player
missions

For more infos go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/244160/

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play from desktop shortcut

PROPER NOTES:

The RLD Version has beta signs in title menu and skirmish screen
no single player campaigns and the classic versions of Homeworld 1+2
don't start at all

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
